attributes.additional_details: Stop all salary and expense payments to members of parliament, until a decision is made and approved on BREXIT.
attributes.background: MPs have failed in the job they are paid to complete. This a dereliction of duties and as such all salary payments and expenses should be stopped until they agree a route forward on the United Kingdom’s EU membership.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
